overview: “Memorias de Navidad” is an audio-visual project with a central Christmas theme and lots of “Salsa Navideña”. The script centers around a grandfather who suffers of an early stage of Alzheimer’s and wants to share his Christmas memories with his family. The grandfather is played by Victor Manuelle, who not too long ago lost his father to the disease, which his grandfather also had.
title: Memorias de Navidad
